description.author: Dylan Thurston <dpt@math.harvard.edu>, Henning Thielemann <numericprelude@henning-thielemann.de>, Mikael Johansson
description.synopsis: An experimental alternative hierarchy of numeric type classes
description.description:
The package provides an experimental alternative hierarchy
of numeric type classes.
The type classes are more oriented at mathematical structures
and their methods come with laws that the instances must fulfill.
